404.title: Opps, this page doesn't exists
404.description:
Or maybe it should exist (?), but it probably doesn't :/
If you really think this page exists, check the URL if it's correct, or if you prefer, check the links below if the page desired exists.

500.description: There was an error here at my house. I can't tell you exactly what happened, but it sure wasn't a good thing! Please try again later.
